title: misc/cgo/test: callback_c.c should compile on Windows 32-bit
body:
The Windows API does not have a sleep() function, it has a
   Sleep() function. In addition, the parameter does not take
   seconds. It takes milliseconds.

   https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/ms686298(v=vs.85).aspx

I have submitted a patch to address this issue: https://go-review.googlesource.com/#/c/19500/
